fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, you may choose one player that has whispered you to grant the wish of, as well as naming a drawback to said wish.
- At night, the player may choose whether or not they accept the drawback. The wish takes effect after the player's response. You are told at the end of the night if they accepted the drawback.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During the day, players may whisper "I wish . . ." to you to have their wishes potentially fulfilled.
- Wishes and Drawbacks can be temporary or permanent throughout the game.
- The host may deny a wish if the wish or drawback is deemed 'too chaotic'
- You many only grant one wish per player.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have 2 players affected by their drawbacks.
